title: Купцы и дети
overview: "Merchants and Children" is a story on the topical, regardless of time, topic of the relationship between fathers and children. The action takes place in Russia in 1910. The son returns to the house of the patriarchal and conservative merchant of the first guild after his studies. During his studies, thanks to new friends, his views have changed dramatically. However, this categorically does not suit the father, and he is determined to re-educate his son. Will he be able to get everything back on track?
